title: "Scaling for the future of ophthalmology with artificial intelligence powered by Azure Healthcare APIs"
excerpt: "ZEISS partnered with Microsoft to power the ZEISS Medical Ecosystem with the Azure Healthcare APIs. Azure Healthcare APIs allow for data to be standardized and exchanged between the ZEISS medical centers and their devices across the world while leveraging Microsoft's geo-support for data residency requirements."
